column4: So I rebooted my computer and I try and startx and I get IO error 104
what is the whole error please
it was fatal IO error 104 (Connection reset by peer) on X server 0:0 after 0 requests
are you looking at cli (command line) now or gui (windows look)?
try $sudo apt-get install xterm and see if that doesnt fix it
trying that now ... do I put the $ in front of sudo? if so what does that do? ...
